languages.text: {n}Кибелла смотрит на вас с едва уловимой улыбкой.{/n} "Да. Вместе. Так и исполняется обретение света — не поодиночке, а вместе. Теми, кто связан во свете Его и славу Его".

traits.locale_text: {n}Кибелла смотрит на вас с едва уловимой улыбкой на губах.{/n} "Да. Вместе. Так и исполняется Кан'Шин — не поодиночке, а вместе. Теми, кто связан во свете Его и славу Его".

languages.text: {n}She looks at you with an elusive smile.{/n} "Yes, we did. That is how the ritual of finding light is performed: not alone, but together, by those who are bound in His light, in His name."
languages.original_text: {n}Кибелла смотрит на вас с едва уловимой улыбкой.{/n} "Да. Вместе. Так и исполняется обретение света — не поодиночке, а вместе. Теми, кто связан во свете Его и славу Его".

traits.locale_text: {n}She looks at you with an elusive smile.{/n} "Yes, we did. That is how Kan'shin is performed. Not alone, but together. By those who are bound in His light, in His name."
{n}She looks at you with an elusive smile.{/n} "Yes, we did. That is how Kan'shin is performed. Not alone, but together. By those who are bound in His light, in His name."

{n}She looks at you with an elusive smile.{/n} "Yes, we did. That is how the ritual of finding light is performed: not alone, but together, by those who are bound in His light, in His name."

languages.text: {n}Sie lächelt dich schüchtern an.{/n} "Ja, das haben wir. So wird das Ritual der Lichtbringung ausgeführt: Nicht allein, sondern gemeinsam, von jenen die in Seinem Licht und in Seinem Namen verbunden sind."
languages.original_text: {n}She looks at you with an elusive smile.{/n} "Yes, we did. That is how the ritual of finding light is performed: not alone, but together, by those who are bound in His light, in His name."

traits.locale_text: {n}Sie lächelt dich schüchtern an.{/n} "Ja, das haben wir. So wird das Ritual der Lichtbringung ausgeführt: Nicht allein, sondern gemeinsam, von jenen die in Seinem Licht und in Seinem Namen verbunden sind."

languages.text: {n}Te mira con una sonrisa furtiva.{/n} «Sí. Así se realiza el ritual de la búsqueda de la luz: no en solitario, sino en conjunto, por aquellos unidos a Su luz y en Su nombre».
languages.original_text: {n}She looks at you with an elusive smile.{/n} "Yes, we did. That is how the ritual of finding light is performed: not alone, but together, by those who are bound in His light, in His name."

traits.locale_text: {n}Te mira con una sonrisa furtiva.{/n} «Sí. Así se realiza el ritual de la búsqueda de la luz: no en solitario, sino en conjunto, por aquellos unidos a Su luz y en Su nombre».

languages.text: {n}彼女はとらえどころのない笑みを浮かべてあなたを見ている。{/n}「ええ、そうよ。それこそが、光を見つける儀式のやり方なの。一人ではなく、共に。主の光の中で、主の名によって結ばれた者たちで」
languages.original_text: {n}She looks at you with an elusive smile.{/n} "Yes, we did. That is how the ritual of finding light is performed: not alone, but together, by those who are bound in His light, in His name."

traits.locale_text: {n}彼女はとらえどころのない笑みを浮かべてあなたを見ている。{/n}「ええ、そうよ。それこそが、光を見つける儀式のやり方なの。一人ではなく、共に。主の光の中で、主の名によって結ばれた者たちで」

languages.text: {n}她对你露出了令人捉摸不定的微笑。{/n}“没错，我们做到了。这就是完成寻光祭礼的方式——并非独自前进，而是在祂的明光与圣名之中，与同受约束的伙伴同行。”
languages.original_text: {n}She looks at you with an elusive smile.{/n} "Yes, we did. That is how the ritual of finding light is performed: not alone, but together, by those who are bound in His light, in His name."

traits.locale_text: {n}她对你露出了令人捉摸不定的微笑。{/n}“没错，我们做到了。这就是完成寻光祭礼的方式——并非独自前进，而是在祂的明光与圣名之中，与同受约束的伙伴同行。”

languages.text: {n}Elle vous regarde avec un léger sourire.{/n} « Oui. C'est ainsi que doit être accompli le rituel : ensemble, par celles et ceux qui sont liés dans Sa lumière, en Son nom. »
languages.original_text: {n}She looks at you with an elusive smile.{/n} "Yes, we did. That is how the ritual of finding light is performed: not alone, but together, by those who are bound in His light, in His name."

traits.locale_text: {n}Elle vous regarde avec un léger sourire.{/n} « Oui. C'est ainsi que doit être accompli le rituel : ensemble, par celles et ceux qui sont liés dans Sa lumière, en Son nom. »

languages.text: {n}Sana kaçamak bir gülümsemeyle bakıyor.{/n} "Evet, başardık. Işığı bulma ayinini gerçekleştirmenin yolu, yalnızlıktan değil de birliktelikten geçer. O'nun ışığında, O'nun isminde bağlananların birlikteliğinden..."
languages.original_text: {n}She looks at you with an elusive smile.{/n} "Yes, we did. That is how the ritual of finding light is performed: not alone, but together, by those who are bound in His light, in His name."
